name: Bridge Protocol
description: Bridge Protocol describes itself as a RegTech company specializing in identity services on the NEO Blockchain. The Bridge Protocol (BRDG) utility token is transacted for verification claims such as KYC/AML on the Bridge Network. The Bridge Passport was developed as a Google Chrome Extension and is now available via the Chrome Web Store. It can be downloaded through GitHub and has compatibility with chromium-based browsers such as Brave, Opera, and Firefox. To learn more, visit Bridge Protocol https://www.bridgeprotocol.io.
